THIS TORRENT USES X265 HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) VIDEO
PLEASE USE A PLAYER THAT SUPPORTS X265 HEVC VIDEO LIKE VLC, POTPLAYER, ETC

THIS SHARE IS A COLLECTION OF EXTRAS, FANEDITS, AND SCENES FEATURING GRACE PARK
ALL GRACE PARK BLURAY EXTRAS APPEARANCES WERE EDITED TOGETHER
FIVE FANEDITS FEATURING ATHENA AND BOOMER ARE INCLUDED
PLUS AN EXCELLENT FAN Q&A FROM 2006

Battlestar Galactica Grace Park Extras and Fanedits: 56m45s 468,502,413bytes
Handbrake x64 0.10.5 20160212 custom build with FDK (HE-AAC) support
video: 1920x1080 HEVC crf=22.00to27.00 preset=medium (video ~1558Kbps to ~2978Kbps)
video: 480p Extras HEVC crf=20.50to24.75 preset=medium (video ~468Kbps to ~482Kbps)
video: 480p s3e18.Athena HEVC crf=18.00 preset=veryslow denoise=1 (video ~818Kbps)
video: 288p SyFy.Q.and.A HEVC crf=18.00 preset=veryslow (video ~365Kbps)
audio: 6-channel HE-AAC 256Kbps OR 2-channel HE-AAC 96Kbps (64Kbps interview only)

Why download this Grace Park collection of BSG videos? Because you like ...
1. Grace Park
2. the characters Athena and/or Boomer
3. the new BSG and you want to watch fanedits and extras featuring Eights

These videos are a collection of Grace Park Battlestar Galactica Scenes, Extras, Fanedits, and an interview. They are encoded using x265 HEVC for the video and HE-AAC for the audio. CRF constant quality was used for each encode though multiple CRF values were tried for different videos to get the best combination of quality and compression.

>> Athena Bonus Scenes: 2 excellent Athena scenes
02m13s Deleted.Scene.s3e18.Athena.Confronts.Cally.480p.2ch
01m39s Extended.Scene.s4e18.Athena.Confronts.Chief.1080p.6ch
These two scenes show Athena separately confronting Cally and Chief. The Cally video was a 360p deleted scene and had extra processing applied to it to maximize it's quality. It still doesn't look great but both actresses do an excellent job.

>> BluRay Extras: edits that only include Grace Park
02m26s part1.720p-1080p.2ch
15m12s part2-part6.480p.2ch
These are edits of all the Extras scenes with Grace Park from the Blu-Rays, clips from the Battlestar Galactica Blu-Ray box set extras covering all 4 seasons and the movies Razor and The Plan. There are 6 files to account for the different resolutions and aspect ratios.

>> Compilation Fanedits: Every Eight scenes from the Previously Seen and Drum intros
09m56s Previously.Seen.Eights.Montage.1080p.6ch
01m21s Taiko.Drum.Montage.Athena.and.Helo.1080p.6ch
00m40s Taiko.Drum.Montage.Boomer.and.Chief.1080p.6ch
These are fanedits of all the Eight scenes during the Previously On and Taiko Drum intros. The editing was simply a chronological clip compilation for each.

>> Boomer Fanedits: 2 short fanedits of memorable Boomer scenes
03m11s s1e12.Baltar.Counsels.Suicidal.Boomer.1080p.6ch
01m20s s1e13.Boomer.Thanks.Adama.1080p.6ch
The first fanedit shows Boomer contemplating suicide as she cleans her pistol when Baltar walks into her barracks. He proceeds to very carefully counsel Boomer, subtly encouraging her to kill herself. This is an extremely intimate and intense scene with a shocking ending. The editing consisted of removing Head Six's dialog though she can still be seen in some shots. The goal was to focus on just Boomer and Baltar.
The second fanedit is of Boomer returning from successfully destroying the Basestar where she saw many copies of herself confirming she was a Cylon. As Adama thanks her, Boomer's "Thank you sir" is followed by the biggest surprise in sci-fi TV history. The editing consists of focusing on just Boomer and Adama by removing many of the the Lee and Adama shots from the sequence.

>> Grace Park Interview: no longer on SyFY.com
18m42s SyFy.Q.and.A.2006-09.288p.2ch
This is an excellent fan Q&A Grace did at the SyFy offices in 2006 which is no longer available at SyFy.com. Note, the source was 384x288 VP6 video so the quality is not that great though the content is excellent.
